title: Footprint Dingbats?
content: Hey! Does anyone know of a dingbat font that has a glyph of footprints (shoe-shaped). I am designing a leaflet with a guided tour and it would be good to have the trail shown by shoes marching around the page. I found bare feet ones somewhere, but would prefer shoe prints really. any ideas? thanks!
author: Bendy

comments.content: Karsten LÃ¼cke's [Tiptoe](http://web.archive.org/web/20100304003139/http:/vllg.com/KLTF/Tiptoe/mudTyper+Weights/) has some nice foot-shaped (and shoe shaped) dingbats
